CustomField.description: Generate age analysis & monitor customer account details for non-payments, delayed payments & other irregularities. -Initiate Collections effort -Ensure timely collections eg COD immediate, 30 days or 60 days term -Ensure all clients remain informed on their outstanding & deadlines by email reminders & SOA -Review & Resolve billing discrepancies -Cash on Hand (Petty Cash float) & Cash at Bank: Local Currency/USD, exchange rate, book rate vs spot rate -Cashflow: weekly banking & reconciliation
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Generate age analysis & monitor customer account details for non-payments, delayed payments & other irregularities. -Initiate Collections effort -Ensure timely collections eg COD immediate, 30 days or 60 days term -Ensure all clients remain informed on their outstanding & deadlines by email reminders & SOA -Review & Resolve billing discrepancies -Cash on Hand (Petty Cash float) & Cash at Bank: Local Currency/USD, exchange rate, book rate vs spot rate -Cashflow: weekly banking & reconciliation
CustomField.label: Accounts Receivable
